WorkItem.ClosedComment: WPP now correctly sort column with DateTime.
WorkItem.Description:
Sorting computers by Last Sync Time or Last Reported Status sorts by the string representation of the date rather than the date itself.

i.e. if you have D/M/Y dates, and you have computers that last reported on 9/11/2009, 1/12/2012 and 24/10/2013, and you sort by date descending, you'll get the following date order:

9/11/2009
24/10/2013
1/12/2012

instead of:

24/10/2013
1/12/2012
9/11/2009
WorkItem.Summary: Sorting by date uses string sorting
